attributes.action: Have a Covid 19 day to celebrate its end and remember those who suffered.
attributes.additional_details: Its scary to sit here knowing i could lose my job, home or a family member. Its those that have the least which give more and suffer most. A proper thank you is owned by everyone to NHS, cleaners and supermarket staff etc.
attributes.background: Have a bank holiday once this is all over to bring everyone together to say thank you to our public services, everyone who helped and the British resilience.  Something like the Queens golden jubilee.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307364

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
